resources.string: The system did not find your mobile phone number, which caused you to fail to complete the device authentication. Please contact the administrator for processing!
The list of recently logged-in devices. The device with the tag after the device name represents the next time you log in to the device without performing new device authentication.
The number of devices that do not need to be authenticated has reached the maximum limit. Please delete or turn off the unneeded devices, then try again.
Please enter the set device name
Are you sure you want to delete the device?
